title: dhyAnattil varuginra
sahitya:
dhyAnattil varuginra cinmayamE cittam teLindadum en mayamE paramAtmanE


anupallavi

  nAnA vikAraminri mOna samAdhiyilE nAn nAn enruLLE naTamADum tanmayamE


caraNam    karma vAsanaiyAna janma vAsanaigaLai kadir kaNDa paniyAkkik-kaTTarukkum varanE
vanna maNi shuDar vAnAgi vaLiyAgi mazhaiyAgi vAzhvAgi mannuyirk-uyirAgi
